price: 1 Ô hommes ! Craignez votre Seigneur. Les affres et le tremblement qui accompagneront l’Heure sont terrifiants.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱتَّقُواْ رَبَّكُمۡۚ إِنَّ زَلۡزَلَةَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ شَيۡءٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu ittaqū rabbakum inna zalzalata al-sāʿati shayon ʿaẓīmun
